H0.text: The antirrhinum plant is more commonly known as what. Lion's Mouth

H1.text: The antirrhinum plant is more commonly known as what. Dog's Mouth

H2.text: The antirrhinum plant is more commonly known as what. Toad's Mouth

H3.text: The antirrhinum plant is more commonly known as what. SNAPDRAGON

A4.text: commonly known as dragon flowers or snapdragons because of the flowers' fancied resemblance to the face of a dragon that opens and closes its mouth when laterally squeezed.

A5.text: They are also sometimes called toadflax or dog flower.
